title: Padma Lakshmi showcases her ample cleavage in sports bra and leggings during cooking demonstration
text:
She has published three cook books, dating back to 1999, over her lengthy career in the spotlight.

And on occasion, Padma Lakshmi takes to her social media platform to share cooking tips for some her favorite specialty dishes.

She added an extra bonus to her adoring fans in her latest post on Wednesday, when she shared her recipe for a hot berry sauce dressed in a revealing sports bra and leggings.

Hot stuff: Padma Lakshmi offered up a cooking demonstration on Instagram in a black sports bra and matching leggings on Wednesday

'Making a Clove & Berry Sauce for #littlehands,' she wrote in the caption before adding, 'I apologize for my workout wear. Clearly I'm multi-tasking.

The 49-year-old Indian born star looked in fine form in the sporty ensemble.

For the step-by-step demonstration, styled her raven tresses long and straight, but pulled back the front of her locks with a couple of stylish hair pins.

Cooking: The Top Chef Host shared her recipe for a hot berry sauce in her sporty wear

Expertise: The Indian-born star has published three cook books over her career

Just last week, the former supermodel made a statement and shared a stunning snap of herself holding her bare chest as she wore nothing but a pair of nude Spanx.

It was taken while she was getting ready for the Emmy Awards in Hollywood a month ago.

'Feeling emotionally, physically & spiritually secure #emmys #tbt,' she wrote in the caption.

Perky: At one point, the television personality started singing during her demostration

Padma has been the host of the cooking competition program Top Chef since season two in 2006, which is now in its 17th season.

She has also hosted the Food Network series Padma's Passport that was part of the larger series Melting Pot in 2001.

Before her big break in television, she received accolades for her cookbook Easy Exotic, which included the Best First Book award at the 1999 Gourmand World Cookbook Awards.

She has since published two more food related books and her memoir: Love, Loss And What We Are.
description: Padma Lakshmi, 49, showcased her ample cleavage in a sports bra and leggings during a cooking demonstration on Instagram on Wednesday.
